QuestData.Title: The Void March
QuestData.Description: Hidden behind the veil of the Twisting Nether, the abominations of the void march upon Oshu'gun. The great void growing deep within the mountain has drawn them like moths to a flame.$b$bWave upon wave, the creatures of the void march upon the mountain and sacrifice themselves to Invalidus. The void lord Invalidus cannot be allowed to feast upon the other void creatures, else it will become too powerful to stop.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: The voice of Kalandrios whispers to you upon the wind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Void Terrors and $2oa Void Tendrils.
QuestData.CompletionText: If the void creatures are not dealt with, Invalidus will grow too powerful to stop.
QuestData.RewardText: The void lord must be stopped. Thanks to your effort, the tide of void creatures has waned... but if we are to defeat Invalidus we must act swiftly.
